donation drive.name: Donation Drive
donation drive.desc:
Consuming 'Charm' on an opponent replenishes some blood. Additionally, you can also activate this effect and Manipulator through blockbreaking with a Bloodrend mantra.
[*Note: 12s to 8s CD between 20 and 60 Charisma.]

blood bank.name: Blood Bank
blood bank.desc: Consuming 'Charm' now gives slight temporary health.

sharing is caring.name: Sharing is Caring
sharing is caring.desc: Your 'Charm' on opponents also slightly increases your blood drain against them.
